item.title: Fixing My Network after expanding the LAN
item.description: Somewhat recently, I finalized the purchase of some computers and computer parts on Craigslist. I was able to bargain for some cheap discounts - and I wanted to plug these computers into my network. Little did I know that I would be in for a wild ride… At the time, my LAN did not consist of much: just an old (but still great!) MacBook Pro 2012, a Raspberry Pi 3B+ and a Surface Pro 5, which is my daily driver.
